signin.title: Sign in to your account
signin.description: Continue with one of the options below to access your wishlists
signin.terms: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

error.title: Authentication Error
error.default: An error occurred while trying to sign in
error.accessDenied: Access denied. You don't have permission to access this page
error.verification: The verification link has expired or has already been used
error.help: If the problem persists, please contact our support

logout.title: Sign out
logout.confirmation: Are you sure you want to sign out?
